title: Tilted no bloodline today :(
body:
nuff said. I was really hoping it would come out today.

Edited: 180 degree tilt still not out yet...

replies.body: Man, I can't wait for you guys to finally get to grips with Bloodline. Stoked to see what you think...

The fact that you're here now makes me think it's coming tomorrow.

But I've been wrong before.

Either way I'M HYPED.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zUMnO5kf,comment-id=00050003,timestamp=2016-05-27T12:26:10.274+0000)
>
> The fact that you're here now makes me think it's coming tomorrow.
> 
> But I've been wrong before.
> 
> Either way I'M HYPED.

I'm not going to enter a race that I definitely will lose, Mr. flash of keyboards.

If it's today I won't be doing anything so I'm WHOLLY PREPARED.

TODAY IS THE DAY OF REDEMPTION hopefully.

Well if it is today, I would keep my eyes open during the next three hours. Either they gonna release it as a start of their office day as the first thing they do when they start (which will ba 9-10 AM I guess, which will be in an hour or two at their HQ I think if I remember timezones correctly). Or they would release it around point 12, because then every Rioter is on lunch break officially and can turn their attention to the boards exploding and share the moment with their community. Also, this allows them to do some last minute checking today before the release.

So I'd say 2-4 hours. IF it's coming today ^^

Well right now it's about 6 where Riot's main office in NA is, so I can see them putting it out in a few hours, though given the release times of the previous Shurima stuff I'm more than prepared to wait till noon for that.

Hey Sharjo.

In a completely unrelated comment, totally not related to Bloodline and when it may turn up, I'd like to remind you to take care of yourself.  It'd be pretty bad if you got carpal tunnel from refreshing webpages, if, for example, something like Bloodline didn't turn up for a few days.  Hypothetically speaking.  Also remember to stretch, and that sitting for long periods of time is probably quite bad for you.  Hydrate and stuff too.

This has been an unprompted health message from someone not on the Narrative team.

I always stretch regularly mainly because I can't sit still for very long anyway, so no worries, I'm definetly taking care of myself. I am prepared!

Also thanks for the consideration, it's very much appreciated.
carpal tunnel is not a matter of laugh i got it from playing league since 2009 now i hate my life :(

http://pre02.deviantart.net/64b1/th/pre/i/2016/004/c/4/mordekaiser_sticker_by_nimrohd-d9mqzyy.jpg

My body is ready.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zUMnO5kf,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-05-27T06:46:16.248+0000)
>
> http://pre02.deviantart.net/64b1/th/pre/i/2016/004/c/4/mordekaiser_sticker_by_nimrohd-d9mqzyy.jpg
> 
> My body is ready.

Admit, you waited for it far too long.

The sheer fact that you posted this is getting me hyped.

I'm pushing a big lid over this bubbling bottle of "LORE", but it's coming too close, I can't handle it, soon I will be destroyed.  Tell the rest of the forum I'll miss them and tell Jaredan I like his glasses in that Ask.fm page.
Dinopawz... Pls stop playing with our feelings {{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
Rito plz I'm at like 180 degree tilt right now.....

1) There's still plenty of time left in the day, especially considering it's almost 12 pm where Riot is at.
2) Patiences, young one. They will release Bloodline in due time. It has only been one week.
what is bloodline?

Bloodline is referring to a link on the Shurima Lore page that is grayed out named "Bloodline". It will most likely be a long lore story telling what happens to many of our Shurima characters after the events of their specific lore.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/shurima/intro

It's at the bottom of the page above all the champs. It was added after they released all the bios. The link hasn't been turned on yet though.
Now y'all know how I feel about Varus. Jaredan confirmed that there's big plans for him lorewise going on atm.

I kinda hope we get more lore faster too, but beggers can't be choosers. Though first I need to get bloodline first, rito kinda truamatize me with the whole jhin thing...at this point I would even take a soon from Jaredan

Yeah, that Jhin thing was pretty bad. I remember being super disappointed thatI'll have to wait another 2 weeks for his reveal. I like teasers and hype build up, but Jhin's wait took it way too far, the hype for him was already dead by the time he was revealed.
You will know when it arrives when Sharjo post a thread about it. So patience lorewalkers.
but me patience is running low man...been starve too long by rito and it's not fair to tease a starving person with food. Q.Q i neeeed iiiiiit Q.Q NOOOOWWWWWWWW
What's bloodline? Did I miss something?
Sorry but what's blood line?

you mean... THHHHAAATTTT BLOODDDLINNEEE????

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_CLgpd241Aw/hqdefault.jpg
What is this about?

On the shurima page there is an unaccessible section called "bloodlines" that was added a week ago.

No one knows what this is about.
Hmm ty.
Wasn't it confirmed that it won't be coming out until next week?

Uhhh no? I can't remember a single redpost that even mentioned bloodlines.

So unless you have a source I'm not really believing it.
